title: GRAPH Common criticism of the electoral college

content.prompt: The data in the graph best illustrate which of the following common criticisms of the electoral college?

choices.label: Small states have fewer electoral votes than large states and therefore have no impact on presidential elections.
Individuals in small-population states have a greater impact on the electoral college than individuals in large-population states.
Candidates from states with a large number of electoral votes have a major advantage in the electoral college.
Smaller states have more electoral votes than larger states, which distorts the popular vote.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
